subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jayson Megna, a rookie, had his first career goal and assist, and the visiting Pittsburgh Penguins snapped a three-game skid by beating the Carolina Hurricanes, 3-1, on Monday.
snippet: Jayson Megna, a rookie, had his first career goal and assist, and the visiting Pittsburgh Penguins snapped a three-game skid by beating the Carolina Hurricanes, 3-1, on Monday.
